message:
As the internet is our today window to run our business and attract more customers, discover the news, explore the latest technologies, current political status, fashion, food, health, ...etc

So, if you want any information about something, you have to take a tour through hundreds of websites.

According to Netcraft website statistics in December 2013, the number of websites is more than 861 million sites with an increase of 227 million only this year.
Every day at least one new website is created. its a very big business.

You have the chance to enter this business and learn how to create innovative and creative websites based on open source technologies like Facebook used

Pick your seat before 15/1/ 2014
Register now at http://foe.pitechnologies.net/ and get 10% off
Or call us at : 01017473777
